channel.title: Improvements to Passive Mode
channel.description:
Hi, how are you I enjoy playing the Satis Factory but hate spiders so much that I am using Passive Mode.
However, I hope that the Passive Mode allows us to select and remove hostile creatures.
I want to select only the type of monster that I want to remove from the type of monster that I want to remove in the form of a check box, pig, spider, and poison flower.
Thank you for reading my proposal. Always be healthy and happy.

item.title: Improvements to Passive Mode
item.dc:creator: @ZachFett Zach Fett
item.description:
@ZachFett wrote:

I’d also like this, I simply only want to remove spiders/stingers, not the other two hostile NPC types or the toxic gas.

Read full topic
